name: Parasite
overview: A dungeon crawler for one or two players from Zsoft for the Amiga. Not much to say other than it seems to be built on the same engine and principles as their other games as well as the Black Dawn series. Coded, music and gfx by Shaun Watters (timeslip1974), graphics by Timothy Jon Gilbert Musician : Mike Richmond. This game had a sequel in Parasite II.
